references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, a core technology used in the paper's target model and a foundation for many subsequent Text-to-Image models.

references.paper_title: Improving image generation with better captions
references.reason: This paper introduces DALL-E 3, a leading commercial Text-to-Image model, providing a strong benchmark for the proposed GUARDT2I framework.

references.paper_title: Safe Latent Diffusion: Mitigating Inappropriate Generation in Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of adversarial prompts, which directly informs the design and evaluation of the GUARDT2I framework.

references.paper_title: MMA-Diffusion: MultiModal Attack on Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel attack method against Text-to-Image models, providing valuable insights for defense mechanisms and used to evaluate the GUARDT2I framework's robustness.

references.paper_title: Ring-A-Bell! How Reliable are Concept Removal Methods for Diffusion Models?
references.reason: This paper examines the limitations of existing Text-to-Image defense methods, directly motivating the need for a new generative approach like GUARDT2I.
